name: CreateMailchimpTemplate
description:
Create a new Classic template in Mailchimp.

This tool is used to create a new Classic template in a Mailchimp account. It should be called when a user wants to add a new email template for marketing purposes.

parameters.name: template_name
parameters.description: The name assigned to the new template. It should be descriptive for easy identification.

parameters.name: template_html_content
parameters.description: The raw HTML content for the template, supporting Mailchimp Template Language.

value_schema.description: The raw HTML for the template. We  support the Mailchimp [Template Language](https://mailchimp.com/help/getting-started-with-mailchimps-template-language/) in any HTML code passed via the API.

parameters.name: template_folder_id
parameters.description: The ID of the folder where the template will be stored. Ensure the folder exists in the Mailchimp account.

value_schema.description: The id of the folder the template is currently in.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: folder_id
parameters.description: The id of the folder the template is currently in.

value_schema.description: The id of the folder the template is currently in.

parameters.name: html
parameters.description: The raw HTML for the template. We  support the Mailchimp [Template Language](https://mailchimp.com/help/getting-started-with-mailchimps-template-language/) in any HTML code passed via the API.

value_schema.description: The raw HTML for the template. We  support the Mailchimp [Template Language](https://mailchimp.com/help/getting-started-with-mailchimps-template-language/) in any HTML code passed via the API.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
